Text: Post-grunge is a derivative of grunge and a style of alternative rock and hard rock that began in the 1990s.

--------------------
Text: Post-grunge:  Originally, post-grunge was an informal and even pejorative label used to describe bands that emulated the grunge sound of bands such as Nirvana, Pearl Jam, Bush, Candlebox and Collective Soul.
